weather.precipitation: Spring in Innsbruck is characterized by moderate rainfall and occasional snow showers.
weather.what_to_pack: Pack layers, waterproof clothing, and comfortable walking shoes.

tourism.crowds: Moderate tourist density, not as crowded as peak winter season.
tourism.costs: Accommodation and activity prices are lower compared to peak ski season.
tourism.booking_advice: Book accommodations and tours in advance to secure the best options.

highlights.name: Innsbruck Festival of Early Music
highlights.description: Celebration of classical music from the Renaissance and Baroque periods.
highlights.tips: Purchase tickets early as this festival attracts music enthusiasts.

highlights.name: Alpine Blooms
highlights.description: Lush alpine meadows come to life with colorful flowers.
highlights.tips: Hike or take a cable car to enjoy the blooming scenery.

highlights.name: Easter Market
highlights.description: Traditional market with local crafts, food, and Easter decorations.
highlights.tips: Try local delicacies and handmade souvenirs.

highlights.name: Innsbruck City Tower
highlights.description: Iconic landmark offering panoramic views of the city and surrounding mountains.
highlights.tips: Visit during clear weather for the best views.

recommended_activities.why_this_season: Milder temperatures, blooming flora, and fewer tourists.
recommended_activities.practical_tips: Bring water, snacks, and a map. Check trail conditions in advance.

recommended_activities.why_this_season: Enjoy scenic routes with blossoming trees and mild weather.
recommended_activities.practical_tips: Rent bikes in the city. Follow designated cycling paths.

recommended_activities.why_this_season: Indoor attraction showcasing art and crystal displays.
recommended_activities.practical_tips: Buy tickets online for discounts. Combine with a cycling trip.

recommended_activities.why_this_season: Discover history and art in a Renaissance palace.
recommended_activities.practical_tips: Join a guided tour for insights into the castle's past.

recommended_activities.why_this_season: Spring snowmelt creates ideal water levels for rafting.
recommended_activities.practical_tips: Book with a reputable tour company. Wear appropriate gear.

not_recommended: Skiing and snowboarding as most ski resorts close by late Spring.
